name: @mapp-digital/mapp-fonts
description: A collection of fonts used in MAPP UIs.

scripts.prepare: npm run prebuild && npm run build && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: tsc --project ./tsconfig.json && cp -r illustrations dist/ && cp -r .fantasticon/* dist/iconfont/ && rm -rf dist/iconfont/mapp-fonts.ts

author: MAPP Digital
